Package org.develop.TeamProjectPanaderia.rest.proveedores.controllers

Class ProveedorRestController

java.lang.Object
org.develop.TeamProjectPanaderia.rest.proveedores.controllers.ProveedorRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${api.version}/proveedores") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public class ProveedorRestController extends Object
Controlador REST para manejar operaciones relacionadas con proveedores.
